name: Norwood Systems
tag_list: wireless, mobile, fixed-mobile-convergence, international-roaming, enterprise, service, saas, wi-fi
overview:
Norwood Systems is a developer of scalable fixed mobile convergence solutions targeting the mid-size to large enterprise market.

Its core service offering, Voice Continuity™, is a simple and cost-effective offering that reduces costs and improves contactability for employees when they travel internationally to remote office locations.

Voice Continuity is based upon $15 million of previously invested R&D, using the code-base developed by the previous incarnation of Norwood Systems.

The Company was re-capitalised by its founder in February 2011 and recently closed a Series AA seed round in March 2012.

milestones.source_description: Norwood Systems issues its first public release of Voice Continuity™
